Title: No Orc Left Behind
Description:
This was supposed to be a routine sweep, $n. Clean up a few troggs, make sure there is no threat to the city and then be in the tavern by midday.

Instead I've a group of scouts missing, flame hounds pouring out of the chasm and Xorenth going on about "the next twilight's hammer."

<Commander Bagran spits>

Go in there and get my scouts back so we can figure out what is going on down here.
ObjectivesText: Rescue 5 Kor'kron Scouts in Ragefire Chasm.
RewardText:
That's all that survived?

I don't know who these Dark Shaman are working for, but they are going to pay for this.
